To grab a cup:
Put your hand around the cup from the side.
Squeeze gently.
Lift while keeping the cup upright.

To open a drawer:
Put your fingers between the handle and the drawer.
Close your hand around the handle.
Pull backwards.
Open your hand.
Lift your hand.

To remove a bottle cap:
Put your fingers around the cap from above.
Close your fingers tightly.
Turn the cap to the left.
